text: A Literature Lesson () is a 1968 Soviet comedy drama movie directed by Aleksey Korenev.Скончалась актриса Виктория ФедороваУРОК ЛИТЕРАТУРЫ (1968) It stars Yevgeny Steblov, Leonid Kuravlyov, and Inna Makarova. == Actors == * Yevgeny Steblov as Konstantin Mikhailovich, teacher of literature * Leonid Kuravlyov as Savely Sidorov * Inna Makarova as Vera Petrovna * Valentina Malyavina as Nina Vronskaya * Yevgeny Leonov as Pavel Petrovich Vronsky * Nina Agapova as student's mother * Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya as Anna Tyurina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 comedy-drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksey Korenev
title: A Literature Lesson
